entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023
